entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Friday 13 January 2023
